member.summary: A Shifting Register with a fixed length

member.summary: A array which represents the Register

member.summary: Adds at first, and delete the last.
member.param: The object you want to add

member.summary: Builds a string information about the Register.

member.name: M:controller_design.Integrators_and_Registers.Shift_Register`1.#ctor(`0[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Shift_Register type using the specified Array. (The length of the Array is the length of the Register)

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Shift_Register type with an array of two empty elements.

member.summary: Get access to internal Register
member.returns: The object of the Register at the index

member.name: T:controller_design.Integrators_and_Registers.Integrator_Register
member.summary: A Integrator Register with a fixed length. The value at Register-Index=0 is not integrated, at Register-Index=1 it is one time integrated, at Register-Index=2 it es two times integrated, ... (Register[i]==x_in*p^-i)

member.name: F:controller_design.Integrators_and_Registers.Integrator_Register._Register
member.summary: The value at Register-Index=0 is not integrated, at Register-Index=1 it is one time integrated, at Register-Index=2 it es two times integrated, ... (Register[i]==x_in*p^-i)

member.name: M:controller_design.Integrators_and_Registers.Integrator_Register.do_one_step(System.Single)
member.summary: Calculate one time step in the Register (internal integration)
member.param: The sample Time for one step

member.name: M:controller_design.Integrators_and_Registers.Integrator_Register.reset
member.summary: Resets each element of the Register to 0

member.name: M:controller_design.Integrators_and_Registers.Integrator_Register.ToString
member.summary: Gives an information about each Register Value.

member.name: M:controller_design.Integrators_and_Registers.Integrator_Register.#ctor(System.Single[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Integrator_Register type using the specified Array. (The length of the Array is the length of the Register)

member.name: P:controller_design.Integrators_and_Registers.Integrator_Register.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get access to the Register at a specified index

member.name: T:controller_design.Schematic.Simulator
member.summary: With this Simulator you can simulate the time domain of a Schematic

member.name: F:controller_design.Schematic.Simulator._Schematic
member.summary: The Schematic will be represented as an array of simulatable objects.

member.name: M:controller_design.Schematic.Simulator.simulate(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Simulate the Schematic of a specified time domain with a Sample Time.
member.param: The Time when the simulation will stop
member.returns: A Matrix with 2 rows. In the first row you will find the Values of the simulation, in the second row the corresponding time.
